faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Here you'll find answers to the most important questions about Aura Historia.

free.question: Is Aura Historia really free?
free.answer: Yes, using Aura Historia is completely free. You can search unlimited, add items to your watchlist, and view price histories – without hidden costs or subscriptions.

howItWorks.question: How does Aura Historia work?
howItWorks.answer: Aura Historia automatically searches the websites of over 500 antique dealers worldwide daily and collects all offers in one central place. Our intelligent search allows you to find exactly what you're looking for.

directPurchase.question: Can I buy items directly through Aura Historia?
directPurchase.answer: No, Aura Historia is a pure search platform. If you want to buy an item, you will be redirected directly to the respective dealer's website where you can complete the purchase.

priceAlerts.question: How do price notifications work?
priceAlerts.answer: Once you add an item to your watchlist, we automatically track its price development for you. As soon as something changes with your item, you receive a notification – so you never miss a bargain again.

updateFrequency.question: How often is the data updated?
updateFrequency.answer: Our data is continuously updated. Most dealer sites are searched multiple times daily, so you always see current prices and availability.

dealers.question: Which dealers are on Aura Historia?
dealers.answer: We work with over 500 renowned antique dealers from more than 15 countries. Among them you'll find both large auction houses and specialized dealers for various antique areas.
